Before the sound, ask about one's own body.
Newly alive in extreme poverty,
the old family style is pure and white.
Outside of the three vehicles,
vast and solitary within a single seal.
Returning, practicing among the different species,
the myriad streams naturally flow east.
He ascended the hall and said:

The master ascended the hall.
All Chan practitioners,
The one who swallows the buddhas of the three times,
Why can't he open his mouth?
The one who illuminates the four continents,
Why can't he close his eyes?

original: 許多病痛與爾一時拈却了也。

This dead man!

The ancient path is covered with moss, not falling into emptiness and stillness.
The cold forest is locked in mist, willing to manifest the wind's urgency.
The hook and needle are stable and secret.

Sometimes raining, sometimes sunny, sometimes cold, sometimes hot.
This is mine, and I know it myself.
This is yours, and you can tell it yourself.
